SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class ANSI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.ANSI
public class ANSI extends Object
ANSI escape codes for text and background colors. This class provides constants for various ANSI escape codes that can be used to format text and background colors in the console.

The class is not meant to be instantiated.

  • Method Details

    • removeANSI

      public static String removeANSI(String str)
      Removes ANSI escape codes from the given string.
      Parameters:
      str - the string from which to remove ANSI escape codes.
      Returns:
      a new string without ANSI escape codes.

    • strLenSkipANSI

      public static int strLenSkipANSI(String str)
      Calculates the length of the string excluding ANSI escape codes.
      Parameters:
      str - the string whose length is to be calculated.
      Returns:
      the length of the string without ANSI escape codes.

    • insertSkipANSI

      public static String insertSkipANSI(String str, String in, int pos)
      Inserts a string into another string at the specified position, considering ANSI escape codes.
      Parameters:
      str - the original string.
      in - the string to be inserted.
      pos - the position at which to insert the string.
      Returns:
      a new string with the inserted string.

    • substringSkipANSI

      public static String substringSkipANSI(String str, int start)
      Returns a substring of the given string starting from the specified position, considering ANSI escape codes.
      Parameters:
      str - the original string.
      start - the starting position of the substring.
      Returns:
      a substring of the original string.

    • substringSkipANSI

      public static String substringSkipANSI(String str, int start, int end)
      Returns a substring of the given string between the specified start and end positions, considering ANSI escape codes.
      Parameters:
      str - the original string.
      start - the starting position of the substring.
      end - the ending position of the substring.
      Returns:
      a substring of the original string.

    • padSkipANSI

      public static String padSkipANSI(String str, int len)
      Pads the given string to the specified length with spaces, considering ANSI escape codes.
      Parameters:
      str - the original string.
      len - the desired length of the string after padding.
      Returns:
      a new string padded with spaces to the desired length.
